Service Details: - Provides a range of services to adults who may need help managing their affairs as well as to their families, legal representatives, the courts and the general public - Service areas include Assessments and Investigations:  Helping an Adult Get Support and Receiving Reports of Abuse or Neglect, Health Care Decision Making, Financial Management and Personal Decision Making Services, Review and Monitoring of Private Committees, Other Protective Services, Personal Planning, and Woodlands Class Action
